meta_description: Experience excellent dining, entertainment, and events at Green Dragon Tavern & Museum, Carlsbad restaurant. North County San Diego Private Events & more.
admission_text:
# Memberships

### Choose from 4 Membership Opportunities

**Patriot | $20 per month or $200 annually**  
Includes Name on Website, Membership Welcome Packet & Membership Card, Members-Only Quarterly Newsletter

**Paul Revere | $50 per month or $500 annually**  
Includes Name on Website, Membership Welcome Packet & Membership Card, Members-Only Quarterly Newsletter, Discount on Ticketed Events, 10% off Food and Beverages at the Tavern

[Learn More](https://greendragontavern.kindful.com/?campaign=1161540)

### Become a member

**Ben Franklin | $75 per month or $750 annually**  
Includes Name on Website, Membership Welcome Packet & Membership Card, Members-Only Quarterly Newsletter, Discount on Ticketed Events, 10% off Food and Beverages at the Tavern, Complimentary Admission to more than 1,000 museums across North America, Custom Brick

**Hamilton | $100 per month or $1,000 annually**  
Includes Name on Website, Membership Welcome Packet & Membership Card, Members-Only Quarterly Newsletter, Discount on Ticketed Events, 10% off Food and Beverages at the Tavern, Complimentary Admission to more than 1,000 museums across North America, Custom Brick, Discounts on Room Rentals, Invitation to Private Donor Events and Member Receptions

[Join Today](https://greendragontavern.kindful.com/?campaign=1161540)

##### *50% discount for Members age 29 and under, active duty service members & veterans

# Founded on History

Green Dragon is a historic restaurant experience and [museum](https://www.greendragontavernca.com/museum/) inspired by the original 18th century Green Dragon Tavern in Boston. The original Green Dragon Tavern served as the general meeting place and think tank for events that would eventually shape our great nation to this day....
